name: JimDal in a DinoBump Beta 0.1
description:
Make Sure this is my First Game their is no pause menu or exit menu you have to press alt+f4 to exit and this is an installer

I need Your Suggestion for this game

the official release will be on May 2020 with many improvements and new adventures 

in this beta release you can only roam and fall from sky 

Missions, story  and physics will be added soon as possible 

stay tuned
